title: Video: Childish – aiwake
content:
Toronto duo aiwake debuted with the luscious, ethereal beauty of Birds a couple of months back, and have now followed it up with equally as alluring Childish.

The two piece, comprised of Orphan Jr. and Riggadale, have also released their first officials visuals to accompany the track, a gorgeously toned video directed by Andrew Hamilton. At points it reminds me of the early 2010’s videos for Youth Lagoon and Craft Spells, directed by Boise’s Tyler T Williams – centred loosely around a mysterious narrative. All in all, another mightily ambitious step forward for the duo. Check out Childish below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
